body_html: The commit I just did seems to fix it. It was actually not a bug in TensorFlow but in my code. I kept using the pointer tensor->shape().dim_sizes().data() which becomes invalid after the statement evaluation is finished. I wonder if that was valid before or not. Anyway, this seemed to be the problem and it doesn't crash anymore. So I'm closing this issue for now, unless it will happen again.

body: The commit I just did seems to fix it. It was actually not a bug in TensorFlow but in my code. I kept using the pointer `tensor->shape().dim_sizes().data()` which becomes invalid after the statement evaluation is finished. I wonder if that was valid before or not. Anyway, this seemed to be the problem and it doesn't crash anymore. So I'm closing this issue for now, unless it will happen again.
